content:
That sounds amazing! Street art and murals can really add to the character of a neighborhood, and it's great that you're taking the time to appreciate them.

I'll have to check out "The Daily Grind" - thanks for the rec! There's nothing like a good cup of coffee to start the day off right.

The pier sounds like a great spot to take in the views, and the bike path to the nearby island sounds like an adventure waiting to happen! I'm sure the views from the island will be stunning. You'll have to let me know how it goes when you check it out.

It's great that you're exploring your new city and finding new things to enjoy. Cycling is such a great way to do that, isn't it? You get to experience the city at a slower pace and really take in the sights and sounds.

Do you have any other favorite activities or hobbies that you've been enjoying in your free time, or is cycling kind of your main thing right now?
